attributes.action: Make telephone users only pay for time they are speaking to a real person or receiving the required information.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Telephone users phoning businesses  should not have to pay for time spent on hold, navigating menus, listening to unsolicited announcements (such as 'this call is being recorded') etc. The costs of this time should be borne by the organisation concerned. If the caller gets an engaged tone the company phoned should have to pay the standard connection cost.
